law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec, 78, effective July 12, 2012; and ch. 160, sec. 125, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 4, effective June 8, 2011. -- Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 7, effective January 1, 2011.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2012). This statute was amended by 2012 Ky. Acts chs. 81 and 160, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
